遲好過唔做
但係你諗吓中国已經用抖音知道咗幾多軍事秘密

quote.msg: 其實仲有好多外國細路有用

replies.msg:
對細路好難用理念或國家安全做說服理由
為一辦法係將TikTok變得uncool
Why could google ban yellow shops map and apple ban hkmap.live, but not ban tiktok?
工作電話可以裝娛樂app已經on9啦

quote.msg: Why could google ban yellow shops map and apple ban hkmap.live, but not ban tiktok?

replies.msg:
Because corporations operate only on the fear of losing revenue.

Keeping hkmap.live listed causes more revenue loss than delisting it, thus the decision.

The solution is to find a way to cause more revenue loss to Google/Apple/etc.

quote.msg: Why could google ban yellow shops map and apple ban hkmap.live, but not ban tiktok?

replies.msg: Wait I don’t really get it... Apple/Google are just the medium/host for anyone to publish their software. Even an app that doesn’t generate any income has the right to remain on the store..? hkmap did prompted the revenue loss in some restaurants while the increase in others. What does it have to do with Google/Apple?
